resultset.statement: select count(t2.cus_gender) as NoOfCustomers, t2.cus_gender from (select t1.cus_id, t1.cus_gender, t1.ord_amount, t1.cus_name from (select `order`.*, customer.cus_gender, customer.cus_name from `order` inner join customer where `order`.cus_id=customer.cus_id having `order`.ord_amount>=3000) as t1 group by t1.cus_id) as t2 group by t2.cus_gender LIMIT 0, 50000
